/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided into multiple lanes by white lines, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
